channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - d-bus

item.title: D-Bus and SELinux
item.description:
After a post about D-Bus comes the inevitable related post about SELinux with D-Bus.

Some users might not know that D-Bus is an SELinux-aware application. That means it has SELinux-specific code in it, which has the D-Bus behavior based on the SELinux policy (and might not necessarily honor the "permissive â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
